title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 160.7 - Monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 160.7 - Monitoring

State Regulations

The commissioner shall monitor the program activities of
lenders and businesses that participate in the program. The commissioner may
require periodic reports or request other information from participating
lenders and businesses relating to the status of linked loans and projects
financed by such loans. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
160.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
